DOC.brief_summary: This multicentre , open label , randomize , pilot study evaluate safety efficacy Human Platelet Lysate ( HPL ) subject Androgenetic Alopecia undergo hair transplantation . The study conduct 2 center India . The primary endpoint Increase Hair Follicle viability transplant , Improvement Caliber & Density hair Improvement Photographic assessment randomization end study . The secondary endpoint Physicians Patients self assessment score .
DOC.brief_title: Study To Determine Safety & Efficacy Of Autologous Human Platelet Lysate Androgenetic Alopecia After Hair Transplant
